channel.title: Friends on edel grace altares

item.title: Back to Workâ€¦
item.description: The holidays are officially over, for I went back to work today. It was a bit of a slow day. I got my internship extended, however they basically treated me as a new hire since my contract ended in December. So I’m starting from scratch, essentially. I had no laptop, no e-mail, no account to login into any computer connected to the company’s network… Kinda rough. However, I did manage to do some small tasks that didn’t require the use of a computer.
